name: Coots & Bzoot
description:
Hello, this is my submission, a simple game created in few days for the LudwigJam 2023.
It was created in Unity, and all assets are original
(although sprites of Coots were loosely traced from pictures on Coots' twitter profile).

---

In this game, you take up the role of a small mosquito who just has it on their agenda to agitate lil' Coots.
Will you get bopped by the cat, or will you survive?

---

Sorry if there's any problems with game presentation, this is my first personal published game on itch.io.

Source code on Github: https://github.com/msamyel/ludwig-jam-23-bzoot
